meanings.sent1: The desert is known for its nonaqueous landscape.
meanings.sent2: The oil-based paint is nonaqueous and dries quickly.
meanings.sent3: The fish felt out of place in the nonaqueous environment of the desert.
meanings.sent4: Her nonaqueous personality was like a dry desert, devoid of emotion.
meanings.sent5: The nonaqueous soil cracked under the scorching sun.

meanings.sent1: The nonaqueous substance formed a separate layer on top of the water.
meanings.sent2: The nonaqueous powder clumped together when mixed with water.
meanings.sent3: The nonaqueous material stubbornly resisted any attempt to dissolve it in water.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like oil and water, completely nonaqueous.
meanings.sent5: The nonaqueous solution remained unchanged even after hours of stirring.
